sense.name: a constituent, ingredient, element or factor of a larger whole
sense.examples: They manufacture electronics components. Jealousy was a component of his character. Timing will be a key component to the success of this negotiation. Two basic components of human languages are phonemes and morphemes. This diagram shows the components of the fixed rigging on a sailboat.

sense.name: any one of a set of vector terms added to give a vector sum
sense.examples: Each part of a two-dimensional vector is known as a 'component'. The components of a vector depict the influence of that vector in a given direction. Fido's leash being pulled by Mary has two components, an upward and a rightward component.
